title: Krillhunter XIV: Krill or Be Krilled
description: In a world where krill are everywhere, one man has what it takes to fight back. Experience the missing installment in the Krillhunter saga.
studio: Factual Pictures, Blurry Features, Yellow Hydrant Pictures, Flash in a Pan Productions, Blown Deadline Entertainment, Fake Production Co., Blink! and You’ll Miss It Entertainment, Hard to Watch Films, 12 Frame Pictures, All Over the Place Productions, Cliché Pictures, Trope Media, Redundancy Productions, Train Wreck Films, Cheese Films, Pause Here Productions
altHero: Krillhunter, a blonde man on a boat wearing bib overalls, shoots an automatic spear gun
alt2: a blonde woman lying on the beach and holding a spear gun
alt3: a clown with a hook for a hand holds a rubber chicken
